query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select v such that Modifies(a, v)
assign a; variable v; Select <a, v> such that Modifies(a, v)
assign a; variable v1, v2; Select <a, v1, v2, v2, v1> such that Modifies("tupleSelect", v1) pattern a(v2, "z + x")
query.stuans: 8 i y y i,8 x y y x,8 y y y y,8 z y y z
query.correct: 8 y y y y,8 i y y i,8 x y y x,8 z y y z

id.comment: tuple select with unused variable in clauses

query.querystr: variable v1, v2; assign a; Select <v1, v2> such that Modifies("tupleSelect", _)
query.stuans: i i,i x,i y,i z,x i,x x,x y,x z,y i,y x,y y,y z,z i,z x,z y,z z
query.correct: i i,i x,i y,i z,x x,x i,x y,x z,y i,y x,y y,y z,z i,z z,z x,z y

query.querystr: variable v; assign a; Select <v> such that Modifies("tupleSelect", _)
variable x; Select <> such that Modifies("tupleSelect", _)
variable x; Select y such that Modifies("tupleSelect", _)

id.comment: select synonym does not exist in tuple

query.querystr: variable x; Select <y> such that Modifies("tupleSelect", _)
variable x; Select 123 such that Modifies("tupleSelect", _)
variable x; Select <123> such that Modifies("tupleSelect", _)

id.comment: mix of improper and proper selects in tuple

query.querystr: variable x; Select <123, x> such that Modifies("tupleSelect", _)

id.comment: mix of declared and undeclared selects in tuple

query.querystr: variable x; Select <y, x> such that Modifies("tupleSelect", _)
variable x, y; Select <x, y such that Modifies("tupleSelect", _)
variable x, y; Select x, y> such that Modifies("tupleSelect", _)

id.comment: use of keywords as query variables

query.querystr: variable Select, such; Select <Select, such> such that Modifies("tupleSelect", _)
query.stuans: i i,i x,i y,i z,x i,x x,x y,x z,y i,y x,y y,y z,z i,z x,z y,z z
query.correct: i i,i x,i y,i z,x x,x i,x y,x z,y i,y x,y y,y z,z i,z z,z x,z y

query.querystr: variable Select, such; Select Select, such such that Modifies("tupleSelect", _)
variable x; x such that Modifies("tupleSelect", _)
variable x, y; Select <x, y> such such that Modifies("tupleSelect", _)
variable x; assign a; Select <a.stmt#, x> such that Modifies(a, "x") with a.stmt# = 1 and x.varName = "x"
variable x; assign a; Select <a.stmt#, x.varName> such that Modifies(a, "x") with a.stmt# = 1 and x.varName = "x"
variable x; assign a; Select <a.stmt#, x.stmt#> such that Modifies(a, "x") with a.stmt# = 1 and x.varName = "x"
variable x, y; assign a; Select <a.stmt#, x, y> such that Modifies(a, _) with x.varName = "x" pattern a(y, _"z + x"_)
